text: وفى ثمود اذ قيل لهم تمتعوا۟ حتى حين

translations.translation: And in Thamud, when We said to them: "Enjoy yourselves for a while;"
There is also a Sign for you in (the story of) Thamud. They were told: “Enjoy yourselves for a while.”
There is also evidence (of the Truth) in the story of the Thamud, who were told to enjoy themselves for an appointed time.
And in the tribe of Thamud when it was told to them, “Enjoy for a while.”
And in Thamud, when they were told: "Enjoy yourselves for a while!"
And in Samood: When it was said to them: Enjoy yourselves for a while.
And also in Thamood, when it was said to them, 'Take your enjoyment for a while!'
And in (the tribe of) Thamud (there is a portent) when it was told them: Take your ease awhile.
In the Thamud [there was another sign], when they were told, "Make the most of your lives for a while."
And in Thamud's also was a lesson, when it was said Unto them: enjoy yourselves for a season.
And in Thamud, when they were told, ‘Enjoy for a while.’
And in the Thamud (was another Sign): Behold, they were told, "Enjoy (your brief day) for a little while!"
And in Thamud (there is also a sign), when they were told: "Enjoy yourselves for a while!"
And in Thamood it was said to them: 'Take your enjoyment for awhile'
And in Thamood. They were told, “Enjoy yourselves for a while.”
And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."

[51:43] And [also] in, the destruction of, Thamūd, was a sign, when it was said to them, after the hamstringing of the she-camel, ‘Enjoy [yourselves] for a while!’, until the end of your terms [of life] — as stated in the [other] verse, ‘Enjoy [yourselves] in your dwellings for three days’ [Q.11:65].

And in (the tribe of) Thamud) the folk of Salih ((there is a portent) when it was told them) Salih told them after they hamstrung the she-camel: (Take your ease awhile) enjoy your life until the advent of the chastisement.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } كذا { فِي ثَمُودَ } وإهلاكهم آية عظيمة لأجل العبرة، اذكر يا أكمل الرسل وقت { إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ } على لسان نبيهم حين أردنا أخذهم وإهلاكهم: { تَمَتَّعُواْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ } [الذاريات: 43] أي: تمتعوا وترفهوا ثلاثة أيام، فكذبوا المخبر، وأنكروا عليه خبره

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { وفي ثمودَ } آية أيضاً { إِذ قيل لهم تمتعوا حتى حينٍ } تفسيره قوله تعالى:
